creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mrs Irma Levin in memory of Dr Ben Shenson
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Marks, and Seal

R center: [ 萬玉玲瓏 ] (Ten thousand jewels tinkling sweetly.)
markings: Japanese on back when rolled; R center, rectangular relief: [ 華状元 ] {Kajōgen}
signed: R center: [ 清淑女史] {Seishuku joshi }
title: Plum Blossoms
